vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κλαυδία, -ας, ἡ
Claudia: 2Ti.4:21.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.4.21
§ Claudia, [possibly] "lame"
Claudia, (Proper name), 2Tim. 4:21*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:

vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
革老底亚
1)一名基督徒妇女 (提后 4:21)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Cơ-lau-đia, một người phụ nữ Cơ đốc nhân
